activities: Telvent DTN, LLC is a U.S. company formed under the laws of the State of Delwaware, and is also a wholly owned subsidiary of Schneider Electric SA, a French company publicly traded on the paris stock exchange.  Telvent DTN primarily sells its products or services to businesses (and not consumers).  Furthermore, we specialize in in providing "sofware as a services (SAAS)" solutions to domestic and international customers.  To conduct business, Telvent DTN often collects personal information through its websites to offer free trials, conduct marketing promotions, or to sell / deliver services to its business customers (both domestic and international).
